channel.title: Crows scream when you load game after being beaten
channel.description: After HECU grunts beat the player, if you load saved game, you can hear crows over and over. It seems that logic_auto is not configured correctly.

item.title: Crows scream when you load game after being beaten
item.dc:creator: SiPlus
item.description:
After HECU grunts beat the player, if you load saved game, you can hear crows over and over. It seems that logic_auto is not configured correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: Crows scream when you load game after being beaten
